headline: LKQ Corporation Appoints Sue Gove and Michael Powell to its Board
summary: Enters into Cooperation Agreement with Ancora and Engine Capital Forms Finance Committee ANTIOCH, Tenn., Feb. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LKQ Corporation (Nasdaq: LKQ) (“LKQ” or the “Company”) today announced the appointment of two new independent directors, Sue Gove and Michael Powell, to its Board of Directors (the “Board”), effective immediately, and the formation of a Finance Committee of the Board. In connection with these enhancements, the Company has entered into a Cooperation Agreement

In connection with these enhancements, the Company has entered into a Cooperation Agreement
